item.title: Mortal Kombat 1, Marvelâ€™s Spider-Man Remastered and More Added to PS Plus Extra and Premium Game Catalogs for August 2025
item.content:encoded:
PlayStation has announced the games being added to the PS Plus Extra and PS Plus Premium game catalogs for August 2025, with Mortal Kombat 1 and Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered headlining the 11-total titles added across the Extra and Premium tiers.

Technically, for PS Plus Premium subscribers, it's a full 12 games that they'll have access to thanks to their subscription, but the twelfth title is just a new game trial for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, so it doesn't really count to make this month's catalog additions a full 12, since you only get five hours with it before you'd have to buy the game to play the rest.

This month's additions also include a new day-one release, with Sword of the Sea launching into PS Plus Extra when it arrives on August 19. The game comes from some of the same developers who made Journey, and was showcased earlier this year at a State of Play event.

Other notable inclusions among the nine games entering the PS Plus Extra games catalog, and the two games entering the PS Plus Premium Classic's game catalog include Vanillaware's Unicorn Overlord, and one of 2024's standout indie titles, Indika. And in the case of Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered, subscribers on PS5 will be able to access the native PS5 remaster, while subscribers on PS4 will get access to the Marvel's Spider-Man: Game of the Year Edition, which includes all the DLC released for the game.

And as far as the two classic games are concerned, it's a Resident Evil-focused month, with the original PS One versions of Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3: Nemesis being added to the classic's catalog.

Here's the full list of games being added to the PS Plus Extra and PS Plus Premium game catalogs:

  • Mortal Kombat 1 (PS5)
  • Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered (PS5, PS4)
  • Sword of the Sea (PS5) - available as of August 19
  • Earth Defence Force 6 (PS5, PS4)
  • Unicorn Overlord (PS5, PS4)
  • Atelier Ryza 3 Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key (PS5, PS4)
  • Indika (PS5)
  • Harold Halibut (PS5)
  • Coral Island (PS5)
  • Resident Evil 2 (PS5, PS4) - PS Plus Premium subscribers only
  • Resident Evil 3: Nemesis (PS5, PS4) - PS Plus Premium subscribers only

Along with these 11 games, if you're a Premium-tier subscriber, then you're getting a total of 14 games you can try out in August, including the three games previously announced for subscribers on the base Essential-level tier, like Lies of P and DayZ.
